    Game()
    Constructor of the Class.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()

      Constructor of the Class.
      This initializes the commonGoalCards, the players, the numberOfPlayers and also two status of the game: isLastTurn and gameStartedto false

  • Method Details

    • getGameStarted

      public boolean getGameStarted()

      Method that returns a boolean on the status of the game.

      Returns:
      true if the game has started, false otherwise

    • setGameStarted

      public void setGameStarted()

      Method that sets the status gameStarted to true and notifies the Observers with a Message.

    • getPlayers

      public ArrayList<Player> getPlayers()

      Method that returns an ArrayList of player.

      Returns:
      players, an ArrayList

    • setCommonGoalCards

      public void setCommonGoalCards()

      Method that randomly chooses two common goal cards and constructs them using the CommonGoalCard constructor. It then adds the created cards into commonGoalCards, finally it notifies the Observers with a Message.

    • getCommonGoalCard

      public ArrayList<CommonGoalCard> getCommonGoalCard()

      Method that returns the two common goal cards.

      Returns:
      commonGoalCards, an ArrayList of CommonGoalCard

    • setNumOfPlayers

      public void setNumOfPlayers(int nop)

      Method that given an integer sets the number of players of a game and notifies the Observers with a Message.

      Parameters:
      nop - is an int in between 2 and 4 that represents the number of players

    • getNumOfPlayers

      public int getNumOfPlayers()

      Method that returns the number of players of a game.

      Returns:
      an int that represents numberOfPlayers

    • setPlayerInTurn

      public void setPlayerInTurn(Player pit)

      Method that sets a player, given as a parameter, as "in turn". This also notifies the Observers with a Message

      Parameters:
      pit - a player that has to be set as currently "in turn"

    • getPlayerInTurn

      public Player getPlayerInTurn()

      Method that returns the player currently "in turn".

      Returns:
      the Player in turn

    • setWinner

      public void setWinner(Player win)

      Method that sets a player as the winner. This also notifies the Observers with a Message

      Parameters:
      win - the Player that has to be set as winner

    • getWinner

      public Player getWinner()

      Method that returns the winner.

      Returns:
      a Player, the winner

    • setFinisher

      public void setFinisher(Player finished)

      Method that given Player as a parameter sets it as the first to finish. This also notifies the Observers with a Message

      Parameters:
      finished - the Player that has to be set as the first to finish

    • getFinisher

      public Player getFinisher()

      Method that returns the first player to finish.

      Returns:
      a Player, the first to finish

    • getIsLastTurn

      public boolean getIsLastTurn()

      Method that returns a boolean on the status of the game.

      Returns:
      true if is the last turn, false otherwise

    • assignPersonalGoalCard

      public void assignPersonalGoalCard(int nOfPlayers)

      Method that randomly generates and assigns a different personal goal card for each player.
      This also notifies the Observers with a Message.

      Parameters:
      nOfPlayers - an int in between 2 and 4 that represents the number of players

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player p)

      Method that adds a Player, given as a parameter, into the ArrayList that contains all the player in game.

      Parameters:
      p - a Player that has to be added

    • checkCommonGoalCard

      public int checkCommonGoalCard()

      Method that returns the total score of a common goal card for a player.

      Returns:
      an int that represents the total score of the two common goal cards

    • setLastTurn

      public void setLastTurn(boolean lastTurn)
      Method used to set the last turn.
      Parameters:
      lastTurn - is a boolean, true if is the last turn false otherwise
